## NYCFlights13

```{r}
flights |>
  dim()
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
flights |>
print(n = 15)
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
print(
  filter(flights, month == 1, day == 1),
  n = 5, 
  width = 70
  )
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
print(
  filter(flights, month == 1, day %in% c(1, 15, 30)),
  n = 5,
  width = 70
  )
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
print(
  tail(filter(flights, month == 1, day %in% c(1, 15, 30)), 10),
  n = 5,
  width = 70
  )
```

```{r}
  #| paged.print: false
flights %>% 
  filter(month == 1, day %in% c(1, 15, 30)) %>% 
  slice_tail(n = 7) %>% 
  print(width = 70)
```
